course.subject: ACCT
course.name: Tax and Business Strategy
course.description: This course introduces principles and applications of strategic tax planning into corporate decision-making, including a broad understanding of economic efficiency (incentives), income inequality, tax laws and ethics in strategic tax planning. Students will learn to think about how taxes affect business operation or an investment interest under tax laws changes. It is designed for students who are interested in investment banking, financial/wealth management, strategy consulting and tax advisory.
